text: Suzanne Marie Bonamici ( ; born October 14, 1954) is an American lawyer and politician. She has been the U.S. representative for Oregon's 1st congressional district since 2012. She is a Democrat. Bonamici represented the 17th district in the Oregon State Senate from 2008 to 2011. She was first elected to the Oregon House of Representatives in 2006. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congresswoman Suzanne Bonamici official U.S. House website * Suzanne Bonamici for Congress * Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Oregon Category:Lawyers from Detroit Category:Politicians from Detroit Category:Lawyers from Oregon Category:People from Beaverton, Oregon Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Suzanne Bonamici
